level.heading: Short title.
level.text: This chapter may be cited as the "Department on Disability Services Establishment Act of 2006".

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 101 of Developmental Disabilities Services Management Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-672, December 28, 2006, 54 DCR 1155).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-264
level.text: Law 16-264, the "Developmental Disabilities Service Management Reform Amendment Act of 2006", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-398, which was referred to Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 5, 2006, and December 19, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-620 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-264 became effective on March 14, 2007.
